app.title: coswara
metadata.title.no_metadata: We need some information to continue!
metadata.disclaimer.para1: This study builds on other previous studies which have reported a high level of sensitivity for identifying respiratory illness from the human voice. Any tools with statistical significance in disease detection will also be implemented as part of this app at a later date. The participation in this study is purely voluntary and the details collected will not contain any personally identifiable information.
metadata.disclaimer.para2: The entire recording and data collection should take about 5 minutes only. Please keep your device around 20 cm from your face during the recording and perform the recording in a quiet environment. The recording device should not be shared with others before cleaning/sanitation.
metadata.disclaimer.para3: The Indian Institute of Science Ethics Committee has approved the procedure for non-invasive recordings.
metadata.disclaimer.para4: By clicking start, you agree to our terms and conditions and provide us the consent to your data solely for research and development purposes.
metadata.disclaimer.para4.alternate: You have accepted our terms and conditions
forms.label.taken_test: Have you taken a COVID-19 test?
forms.label.using_mask: Are you wearing a mask now?
forms.label.symptoms: Do you have any of these symptoms?
forms.label.conditions: Do you have any of these conditions?
forms.label.resp_ail: Do you have any of these respiratory ailments?
forms.label.pre_exist: Do you have any of these pre-existing conditions?
forms.label.when_test: When did you take the test?
forms.label.ct_scan_date: When did you take the CT-Scan?
forms.option.pos_test: Tested positive in my last test
forms.option.neg_test: Tested negative in my last test
forms.option.prev_pos: Previously tested positive, but have tested negative now
forms.option.recovered_neg_test: Had previously tested positive, but have tested negative now and recovered fully
forms.option.no_resp_illness_exposed: May have been exposed to the virus through contact
forms.option.not_exposed: Not been exposed to the virus through contact
forms.option.healthy: Do not have any respiratory illnesses
record.message.info: Please make sure you are in a quiet environment and keep your device around 20 cm from your face
record.description.vowel-a: Say /a/ as in "made" and sustain as long as possible
record.description.vowel-e: Say /e/ as in "beet" and sustain as long as possible
record.description.vowel-o: Say /o/ as in "cool" and sustain as long as possible
thanks.heading: Thank you for your participation!
thanks.message.para1: Thank you for being a part of this! Please share it among your friends and relatives.
thanks.message.para2: Follow us at Facebook and Twitter to get the latest updates. Please save the below id for any communication.
thanks.warning.reuse: The recording device should not be shared with others before cleaning/sanitation.
note.title: Note
note.para1: If you are visiting the page from Facebook or Twitter App, you may face difficulty in using microphone. Please open the url below in any of the supported browsers.
